Plot: An FBI profiler is called in by French Canadian police to catch a serial killer who takes on the identity of each new victim.
Title: Taking Lives
Writer: Michael Pye (novel), Jon Bokenkamp (screen story), Jon Bokenkamp (screenplay)
Actors: Angelina Jolie, Ethan Hawke, Kiefer Sutherland, Gena Rowlands
tomatoConsensus: A stylish, but predictable thriller where the only thrills are offered by the sensuous Angelina Jolie.
